Title: Documancer, GPT Assisted Narrator
Description: Serialize roleplay events and build a rich world through log notes and an AI driven event narrator.

Title: Milky Pants Cheese, production and inventory management
Description: An ASP. NET Core application with backend powered by Entity Framework and MySQL. Based on a fictional dairy company for the Argentina's INET - ETP NATIONAL OLYMPICS 2021.

Title: AplicacionGM, roleplay campaign manager
Description: Create GURPS campaigns with their own sets of Characters Sheets, Maps, Actions, etc. And save your progress in an SQLite database to resume your roleplay sessions later on.

Title: AstroLogger, Logging Library
Description: Add the AstroLogger DLL reference to your project and create custom or default Loggers and Logger Factories with desired severity, format, and extra parameters.
